trans_title: 徒步不列颠遗失铁路 第二季
introduction: Rob Bell explores the lost landscapes and infrastructure of some of Britain's former railway lines. From the 1960's the axe fell on 4,000 miles of Britain's rail network. Now, decades later, Rob Bell is going on journey to uncover those lost railway lines. Every week Rob will explore a different line; experiencing the hidden landscapes, lost infrastructure and forgotten worlds that disappeared when the line closed.Season 2 Episode 1 - DerbyshireSeason 2 Episode 2 - The Durham CoalfieldsSeason 2 Episode 3 - North WalesSeason 2 Episode 4 - AberdeenshireSeason 2 Episode 5 - NorfolkSeason 2 Episode 6 - EdinburghProduction Company: Rumpus/Motion Content Group
chinese_title: 徒步不列颠遗失铁路 第二季
